text: Bill Byrge (September 8, 1932 â€“ January 9, 2025) was an American actor and comedian. He was best known for his work as Bobby in many Ernest P. Worrell movies and television shows. His career began in 1985. He retired in 2010. Byrge was born in Campbell County, Tennessee. Byrge died at his home in Nashville, Tennessee on January 9, 2025, at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Comedians from Tennessee Category:Actors
title: Bill Byrge
